FluidConverter

Convert Fluid tags into inline notation

This tool has been created for people who don't like to waste their time. Come on try it!

Example:
<f:myTag myAttr1="myAttrVal" myAttr2="{obj.prop}"/>
=>
{f:myTag(myAttr1: 'myAttrVal', myAttr2: '{obj.prop}')}
